question: In which part of the Iberian Peninsula is Teruel, Spain situated?
asked_question_translated: Dans quelle partie de la péninsule ibérique se situe Teruel, en Espagne ?
answer: Teruel se situe dans la partie nord-est de la péninsule ibérique, en Espagne.
answer_translated_eng: Teruel is located in the north-east of the Iberian Peninsula in Spain.
